channel.description: The Aspire channel to use for package resolution (e.g., "stable", "preview", "staging"). Used by aspire add to determine which NuGet feed to use.

features.description: Feature flags for enabling/disabling experimental or optional features. Key is feature name, value is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

defaultWatchEnabled.description: Enable or disable watch mode by default when running Aspire applications for automatic restarts on file changes

execCommandEnabled.description: Enable or disable the 'aspire exec' command for executing commands inside running resources

experimentalPolyglot:go.description: Enable or disable experimental Go language support for polyglot Aspire applications

experimentalPolyglot:java.description: Enable or disable experimental Java language support for polyglot Aspire applications

experimentalPolyglot:python.description: Enable or disable experimental Python language support for polyglot Aspire applications

experimentalPolyglot:rust.description: Enable or disable experimental Rust language support for polyglot Aspire applications

minimumSdkCheckEnabled.description: Enable or disable minimum .NET SDK version checking before running Aspire applications

orphanDetectionWithTimestampEnabled.description: Enable or disable timestamp-based orphan process detection to clean up stale Aspire processes

packageSearchDiskCachingEnabled.description: Enable or disable disk caching for package search results to improve performance

runningInstanceDetectionEnabled.description: Enable or disable detection of already running Aspire instances to prevent conflicts

showAllTemplates.description: Show all available templates including experimental ones in 'aspire new' and 'aspire init' commands

showDeprecatedPackages.description: Show or hide deprecated packages in 'aspire add' search results

stagingChannelEnabled.description: Enable or disable access to the staging channel for early access to preview features and packages

updateNotificationsEnabled.description: Check if update notifications are disabled and set version check environment variable

language.description: The language identifier for this AppHost (e.g., "typescript", "python"). Used to determine which runtime to use for execution.

sdkVersion.description: The Aspire SDK version used for this polyglot AppHost project. Determines the version of Aspire.Hosting packages to use.
